data.volume_resolution: The value of 'maximum volume' of the receiver
data.sources: List of input sources this receiver supports

onkyo_select_hdmi_output.name: Onkyo Select HDMI output
onkyo_select_hdmi_output.description: Change to the specified HDMI output on the selected receiver.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.title: The Onkyo YAML configuration import failed
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.description:
Configuring Onkyo using YAML is being removed but there was a connection error importing your YAML configuration.

Ensure the connection to the receiver works and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the Onkyo YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_no_host_def.title: The Onkyo YAML configuration import failed
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_no_host_def.description:
Configuring Onkyo using YAML is being removed but there was no host defined in your existing YAML configuration and could therefore not be imported.

Specify a receiver and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the Onkyo YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.title: The Onkyo YAML configuration import failed
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.description:
Configuring Onkyo using YAML is being removed but there was an unknown error when trying to import the YAML configuration.

Ensure the imported configuration is correct and remove the Onkyo YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.
